name: Call of the Wild
description:
Call of the Wild is a turn-based RPG about conflict in the animal kingdom with a focus on strong combat mechanics and party customization.

There was a time when the lands were watched over by the Four Rulers: the Royal Couple of the Great Lake, the Sun King and his Queens, the Gentle Matron of the Forest and  Solitary Khan of the Eternal Green. There was peace and balance.

Those times are over. The Rulers have retreated and the animal kingdom has fallen into chaos. Now it is on you to assemble a pack strong enough to find the Rulers and remind them of their duty.

Features:

  • Ethical animal fights!
  • Travel the lands and add new animals to your pack on your quest to face the Four Rulers of the animal kingdom.
  • Choose your favorites out of over 40 different animals to use in three-versus-three battles. 
  • Every animal has a unique set of abilities  and is lovingly and amateurishly animated.
  • Choose your own path through the game.
  • The stamina system adds another layer of strategy to battles. In a fight, it's important to know when to take a breather!
  • Some animals are able to help you outside of combat.
  • Tip: in the status menu you can view each animal's physical stats and permanent trait

Controls:

Arrow keys for movement
Space to confirm and interact
Escape to cancel orders and close menus

OR

Use your mouse
